description: Our AVN nominated feature continues with pegging, pegging and more pegging! The semi final round of Strap On Idol brings our more promising contestants on stage, stripped naked and displayed on a spanking bench, their assholes in a prime position for reaming. The judges take turns testing the eager guys on their dildo blowjob skills as well as seeing how well their butts respond to getting fucked for real. The big surprise turns out to be Slut Bottom Chris, who brings his own huge dildo to get fucked with. (behind the scenes note: Chris was actually hired to be one of the extras who doesn’t make it past the first round, and turned out to be one of our regular performers for years.) Overconfident Tommy Toscano barely made it to the semi finals, but redeems himself here. Who will go on to the finals, and the strap-on orgy? (Parts 2 of 3)
title: Strap On Idol: The Semi-Finals (Part 2 of 3)
